verses.name: Psalms 28:1
verses.text: Unto thee will I cry, O Lord my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.

verses.name: Psalms 28:2
verses.text: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.

verses.name: Psalms 28:3
verses.text: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
